Summary: I saw what appeared to be several flashing lights in the sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Weston
There were no other sightings in Weston on or around June 17th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving north on us highway 45 from Platte City to Weston, MO. It was just after 1 pm when I saw a series of lights strobing or flashing. There were 7-8 of these lights, one would "Flash," "Strobe" or "Pulse." As soon as one would appear, the previous one would fade out. They were in a semi-circular pattern, and appeared to be hovering over Weston, MO. The event lasted for about 45 seconds. I know the time and exact location because I snapped a picture of some of these lights with my iPhone- It recorded the time date and GPS location when the picture was taken. My feelings were curiousity and interest in whatever they were. As soon as I snapped the picture and lowered my iPhone the lights were gone. I did submit a copy of the photo to Steve Winons and Margie Kay. I am a member of MUFON's Kansas Chapter.
